thread.title: Alabama Trying To Shut Down Abortion Clinics With Buffer Zones
thread.title_full: Alabama Trying To Shut Down Abortion Clinics With Buffer Zones

author: Alan Colmes
title: Alabama Trying To Shut Down Abortion Clinics With Buffer Zones
text:
Colmes Quarters Jun 4, 2015 
Remember how anti-abortion protesters sued Massachusetts all the way to the Supreme Court over a ‘buffer zone’ the state put between them and the clinics where they protest? Well, forget everything that forced-birth activists ever said about free speech and the Constitution, because in Alabama those same hypocrites are about to put a ‘buffer zone’ around… Now read this:
